title: The Handler
description: A Chuck Brandt Thriller - Sequel to the Recruiter   Costa Brava, Spain. A race. A girl. A dead ambassador. A madman who escaped from a Russian insane asylum years ago. One agent missing, another betrayed. Now patriot Chuck Brandt is on his own. Caught up in a conspiracy, on the trail of a deadly enemyâ€”ex-CIA assassin Brandt will not back down. He will not leave his men behind. Even if it costs him his life.
author: Roger Weston
